title: Create one or multiple board members at a time
name: addBoardMember
description: It supports batch insert. To create one boardmember send one object. To create multiple boardmembers send Array of objects.

Success 200.description: Id of the newly created board members

title: Get all the board memebers for a society
name: getBoardMembers

title: Get all the ads posted by a resident
name: getClassifiedAds

title: Create a new Emergency Contact
name: addEmergencyContact
description: Add a new Emergency Contact with all the necessary details by the admin

title: Delete a Emergency Contact
name: deleteEmergencyContact
description: Deleting a Emergency Contact by the Admin

title: Update a Emergency Contact
name: editEmergencyContact
description: Updating a Emergency Contact by the Admin. Contacts are overridden. Each request should contain all the contacts object

title: Get Emergency Contacts of a society
name: getEmergencyContacts
description: Get all the Emergency Contacts of a particular society

title: Create a new Society
name: addSociety
description: Add a new society with all the necessary details by the super admin

title: Update the Society
name: editSociety
description: Update the society details, all properties must be sent

Success 200.description: Newly updated society object with the properties

Error 4xx.description: The id of the Society was not found.

title: Create a new Notice
name: addNotice
description: Add a new notice with all the necessary details by the admin

title: Get notices of a society
name: getNotices
description: Get all the notices of a particular society

title: Respond to a poll
name: respondToOpinionPoll
description: Residents are allowed to submit a response for a poll only once
